metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0051 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1144.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the vulnerable code seems to have been introduced by commit a97c36310f (vim version 8.2.3006), as a fix for issue #8388.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
